name: ShotShock
description:
Story:

You are a soldier down in the marine corps. You have your radar as you try to track down ships. But as your listening to music, the blasts hook up with the rythem of the music. Its now up to you to shoot down as many ships as you can.

Controls:

Left arrow and Right to control the dial. When the red dot flashes, a shot has fired.

Have Fun!
